lead_paragraph: Nico Rosberg led the race nearly from start to finish and earned his first victory in 111 tries. Meanwhile, however, controversy surrounds the series' decision to continue its race in protest-wracked Bahrain.
snippet: Nico Rosberg led the race nearly from start to finish and earned his first victory in 111 tries. Meanwhile, however, controversy surrounds the series' decision to continue its race in protest-wracked Bahrain.
